spell.name: Blight
entries: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and any damage it deals before the end of your next turn is reduced by {@damage 1d4}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and its damage isn't reduced. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

If you target a plant creature or a magical plant, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it. If you target a nonmagical plant that isn't a creature, such as a tree or shrub, it doesn't make a saving throw, it simply withers and dies.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|1-9|2d8} for each slot level above 1st, and the damage it reduces increases by {@scaledamage 1d4|1,3,5,7,9|1d4} for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Celerity
entries: You grant a burst of swiftness to a creature of your choice that you can see within range. The target gains an additional action during its next turn, and its speed increases by 10 feet for the spell's duration. That action can't be used to take the {@action Attack} (except to {@action Shove} or {@action Grapple}), {@action Cast a Spell}, or {@action Ready} action.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Chromatic Orb

m.text: a diamond worth at least 50 gp

entries: You hurl a 4-inch diameter sphere of energy at a creature that you can see within range. You choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create.
A creature targeted by this spell must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d10} damage of the type you chose on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d10|1-9|1d10} for each slot level above 1st, and it causes an additional effect on a failed save depending on the type of orb created.

rows: The creature's AC is reduced by 2 until the start of your next turn.
The creature's speed is halved until the start of your next turn.
You double the amount of damage dice rolled and keep the highest half.
The creature can't take reactions until the end of your next turn.
The creature is {@condition poisoned} until the start of your next turn.
You can push the creature up to 10 feet away from you.

spell.name: Earthbind
entries: Choose one creature you can see within range. Yellow strips of magical energy loop around the creature, reducing its flying speed by 10 feet. At the start of each of its turns, the target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's flying speed (if any) is reduced to 0 feet until the start of its next turn, and it safely descends up to 60 feet if it is airborne, stopping if it reaches the ground.
On each of your turns after you cast this spell, you can use your action to change the target of this spell to another creature you can see within range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Hypnotic Pattern

components.m: a glowing stick of incense or a crystal vial filled with phosphorescent material

entries: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range for the duration. Each creature that enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Wisdom saving throw if it can see the pattern.

On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition charmed} by this spell, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0.

This effect ends early for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor. If ended in either of these ways, the creature cannot be charmed by this spell again until the end of its next turn.

spell.name: Seismic Steps
entries: You send pulses of seismic energy into the ground within range, turning it into {@quickref difficult terrain||3} for creatures other than you for the spell's duration as it shakes and becomes unsteady underfoot.
When you cast this spell, the affected ground violently churns. Each creature other than you standing in this area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to cause the ground to churn in this way again. You can also cause the ground to churn as a reaction before a creature makes an attack roll within range or enters the spell's area.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can use your bonus action to cause the ground to churn instead of your action. Using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher grants a duration that doesn't require {@status concentration}.

spell.name: Shrubdive

time.condition: which you take immediately before taking damage from a fall

entries: Cushioning foliage sprouts across the ground underneath you within range. A creature that ends its fall in that area can subtract 100 feet from the fall when calculating falling damage, including against the triggering fall, and takes only half damage from the fall.
The foliage lasts for the duration. You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 1st.
